articles.title: Saliva testing for COVID-19 quicker, safer than nasal swabs: Study - Devdiscourse
articles.description: According to a study led by the American Society for Microbiology, saliva samples can identify COVID-19 more quickly than testing with nasal swabs.

articles.title: Mother granted license to exhume toddler Clarissa McCarthy drowned by father in Cork double tragedy - Independent.ie
articles.description: A young American woman whose Irish husband drowned their three-year-old daughter and then himself said she is "thrilled" to have been granted an exhumation licence to remove her daughter's body from her husband's grave.

articles.title: Russia 'has lost 10000 soldiers' since start of war - The Times
articles.description: Russia is reported to have lost almost 10,000 soldiers since the start of the war in Ukraine less than a month ago, far above American estimates of the casualties.
